My Projects

SOMS

This is a Smart Order Management System which manages orders for different manufacturing companies. There are many modules in this project and some of them are sales invoice print, sending SMS, generating daily and monthly reports and many more. Users can also manage stock, accounts, and HR.

Technology : Laravel, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL

Stylbx

StylBx is a survey system. Users give answer to a quiz. Based on the user’s input/answers a resultant (a lookbook) is sent to the user via email. There are also many modules like tag based quiz, customization of lookbook, quiz layout is designed for user experience. Users can visualize design and can change their own preferences.

Technology : Laravel, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL, AWS

Jewellery Ecommerce System

A jewellery based ecommerce comprising of admin, seller and customer modules. It manages orders, products, shipping and inventory.

Technology : Angular, TypeScript

JamaUdhar Web Portal

JamaUdhar users can handle their account by taking membership, add-edit secondary account.

Users can signup from the web portal.

Technology : React

Spreein

It is a multi vender ecommerce system comprising of admin, seller and customer modules. It manages orders, products, shipping and inventory.

Technology : React, Redux, JS, AWS

Social CRM

This is a social media aggregator where user can connect social media platforms , upload photo or write text or select template for designing a post, scheduling post on different platforms like Facebook,Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram.

Technology : Laravel, Mysql, jQuery

Multi Vendor E-Commerce Portal

This multi-vendor portal manages products and orders of vendors. It also provides the best Competitive rate for shipping using current rate APIs response and shipping is managed. Payment Gateway is integrated.

I have created notification module and for sending SMS. Multiple types of Email Formats are designed

Technology : Laravel, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL, Vue

Dukan Analytics

Processed excel file and convert them into intuitive dashboard and different reports.

Graphs and Reports based on excel files

Technology : React, Python, MongoDB, AWS, NodeJS

Cella Mall

This is a single vendor-based eCommerce. I have designed UI and I have changed it from Figma to HTML

Technology : HTML5, CSS3, BootStrap

FPCompare

this is a travel insurance management system which includes price comparision module and insurance order management

Technology : Angular, TypeScript

Node API

This project is based on Node backend that includes express, mssql, socket.io, axios, fast-csv

With this project we test our frontend for fack data.

Technology : NodeJS, Express, MSSQL, Socket.io, JavaScript, AWS

eCommerce Aggregator

It is a product that connects multiple ecommerce platforms at one place. In this project I worked on changing front end tech to React. And update the UI as per given designs.

Technology : React, Redux, JS, SCSS

MutualArt

This is an artwork tracking project for people who want to buy artwork can follow artwork and artist to get notification for the next auction and stay updated. In this project I worked on frontend part to make UI responsive and improve overall UI/UX

Technology : HTML, CSS, SCSS, JS, JQuery
